Text:
Thanks a lot! Is this a pre-release or something?
The page format is different to the other books
I've noticed that double L's aren't being displayed, I don't know if this is the case in the PDF but it is in my converted epub format
I got as EPUB from Barnes & Noble online, then I busted the encryption(DRM) and converted it to PDF for the rest of us, as with all ebook conversions there may be errors.
The PDF looks like crap on my reader... can you post the unconverted EPUB please?
On my EB6000 processor ereader the pages get cut in half. Its useless like this for me, gratz on getting the first copy out there though :)
